column5: I am looking at a lake called Kezik out of Sioux Lookout Knobby's fly-in outpost. Has anyone out there been there. If so, how was the fishing? Did you use minnows or crawlers?Thanks,Gary

I was there two years ago. Had great walleye fishing with fish averaging around 18" in length. Northerns were ambundunt but small. This lake is an easy lake to get lost on with numerous narrow channels openning into larger areas so be careful or take a GPS. The cabin we stayed at was rustic and in need of repairs.
